Title: Murder 2.0
Plot: During the week of Halloween, a murderous psychopath taunts the team by using the Internet to leave clues to the next victim's identity.
ParentalRatingReason: R13 Violence and horror scenes. Content may disturb
GuestStars: Max Gail, Patrick J. Adams, Naama Kates, Kristen Bush, Tim Rettley, Brian Groh, Charles Noland, Mike Kersey
